body: the appeal system is so retarded. id doesnt have a default value or some horse manuer. i am gonna appeal here, since this website is garbo. i want to get unbanned because alt f4 is not a scam, dumbos. Its a joke. unban me and I will give you 1k credits no charge. thnaks.

title: appeals are garbo

replies.body:
If you want to get unbanned, you're going to have to go through our appeal system, which you can find here: https://avicus.net/forums/categories/50

If you have any suggestions on improving our appeal system, go ahead and suggest them with a new thread in Server Feedback. Thanks and good luck on your appeal! :).
